TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UpdatePanelDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

Docs.summary: Provides design-time support for the control in a visual designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about this class, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class documentation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed

Docs.param: The control designer regions for the associated control.
Docs.summary: Returns the HTML markup that is used to display the control, and populates the collection with the current control designer regions.
Docs.returns: The design-time HTML markup for the associated control, which includes all control designer regions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetEditableDesignerRegionContent(class System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the content for an editable region of the design-time view of the control.
Docs.returns: A serialized copy of the template that is used to render the associated control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed

Docs.param: An component that implements the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void OnComponentChanged (object sender, System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnComponentChanged(object sender, class System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce) cil managed

Docs.param: A serialized template for the associated control.
Docs.summary: Specifies the content for the editable region of the control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(class System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content) cil managed

Docs.summary: Called when the associated control changes.

Gets a value that indicates whether the designer should use a temporary copy of the control to generate the design-time markup, instead of using the actual control that is associated with the designer.
